about_the_game:
.

Femdom Game World - is a fascinating series of video games, the story centers on strong and sexy women who exercise dominance over men and more. In these games, players are immersed in a world where female domination reigns in all aspects of relationships, providing a unique gaming experience. Experience an exciting world of lust and depravity at Femdom Game World.”



Story:

The protagonist Steve woke up in an unfamiliar environment and found himself in a cell of some gloomy dungeon. Trying to understand what happened and how he ended up here, Steve calls for help, hoping for a miracle. Instead of rescue, he is visited by Mistress, a beautiful but cruel woman who explains to him that he is now her new toy.
Mistress puts Steve in a dungeon to do whatever she wants to him. Every day she subjects him to new trials and punishments, testing his patience and endurance. Despite the horror and pain, Steve begins to plan an escape. He finds a small hammer and begins to slowly and carefully hammer a hole in the wall of his cell, hiding his efforts behind a poster he has requested from his Mistress.
With each blow, Steve gets closer to freedom, but his plan is in constant danger of being exposed. Steve endures a horrific ordeal, but each day reminds himself of his goal to escape this hell.

Immerse yourself in the dark and intriguing world of Mistress Dungeon, experiencing all the same trials Steve had to go through.



Key Features:.

Interactive Punishments: Experience the full brunt of Steve's ordeal through interactive elements that allow you to fully immerse yourself in the game.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and realistic animations that make every scene exciting and suspenseful.
Cool soundtrack: Atmospheric sound effects add to the sense of suspense.
Cool story and narrative: A deep and emotionally intense plot that will hold your attention from start to finish.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains sexual violence, sexual relations without consent, bondage and BDSM. All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz (2 Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.33 Ghz (4 Core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Femdom Game World: Mistress's Dungeon is a first-person narrative adventure game. You play as Steve, who finds himself in the Mistress's dungeon. Now he has to fulfill her various whims and survive in her cruel world, facing daily trials and punishments.
